member.name: M:StatNeth.Blaise.API.DataEntryAsp.DataEntryManager.GetLoadBalancer
member.summary: Gets a LoadBalancer which can be used to obtain a ServerPark at the start of a new interview session. A Serverpark specifies the addresses of the Servers that should be used to host an interview session.

member.summary: Gets a DataEntryController which will use the (servers of the) serverpark to submit interview data and execute actions to obtain a new page definition. The new page will created in the mainControls collection.
member.param: the park that used to host the interview session
The Page object of the AspApplication
The controls collection on the Page that will contain the ASP controls created from the page definition
the url that is used to retrieve definitions of images
